reviewText: I absolutely love these films!!! If you are a fan of the game and you love action packed zombie films, you should probably make an investment in this film collection. Also, the fight scenes are amazing! It is hard to find these movies online without having to pay extra for them... even on Amazon Prime. They are sometimes on Hulu or Netflix, if you have it. However, they never have all of them. It's usually just one or two of them, and it is never in order. They'll provide part 3... then part 5 or just one of them. Then you're like... where's the rest? It's horrible. This collection pack is perfect for an all nighter with friends or maybe just a special someone who has the same passion for zombie films as you do. It would be perfect for the upcoming Halloween. Can anyone say Halloween-All-Nighter?! Also, these movies are fun for the whole family except maybe small children. They might get nightmares.

Great set at a great price but, you should know is that there are no extras whatsoever, or even worthwhile menu selection! So if you were hoping to get all the cool menus and various extra content, you'll want to steer clear of this budget release, and pay a little more for the individual movie DVD releases instead.

As for this set, the 5 movies come on (3) DVDs, with the first 4 movies on the first two discs, and the 5th movie on the 3rd disc.  The menu to choose between movies is extremely plain and generic also. Picture quality of each movie is Excellent.

Pros:
-Cheap. At $14 retail price, you get 5 awesome movies for about $2.80 each!
-No need to change discs as often, as the first 4 movies are combined on two DVDs.
-3 Disc set that comes in regular size DVD case.
-Excellent picture quality.

Cons:
-No extras of any kind. Just the movies.
-An extremely Barebones release.
-Generic looking stock menu.
Great service. The product arrived with no problems. Everything was intacted and the discs were not scratched.

It's defiantly not 1080p. Worth a buy for 5 bucks ($1 per movie) but wish it included Resident Evil: The Final Chapter (2016).

Arrived in excellent condition and a must have for any true resident evil fan
Has all 5 movies on a few DVDs, which is convenient to have. I was missing almost all of these and just never wound up picking them up, so it's great for my collection.

Ok, love the movies and the price can't be beat but, that being said they are fairly low quality.  The closed captioning does not work at all on 3 of the 5 movies. I thought it could be the disks I got so I returned them and requested replacements.  (BTW, the replacement process was very fast, new movies arrived right away, can't ever fault Amazon with speed of delivery.). I was so excited to get the replacement movies because I am hearing impaired and really need the closed captioning.  New disks have the exact same issue.  The menu says closed captioning is available but it can't be turned on.  It is the same 3 movies, 1, 2 and 3.  Closed captioning is available on 4 & 5.  I am not going to return them again.  The movies are worth what I paid it is just disappointing to know they were supposed to have closed captioning but don't.
The whole collection in one box, what's not to like.
Granddaughter love the series
was in perfect condition
Arrived as promised.

The Resident Evil series is a reliable source of hot chick vs zombie action and at $15 this is a great buy.  The monsters are scary, the zombies creepy, the evil corporation is evil, the action exciting and the chick is hot.

The first two films are a bit dated with their special effects, the CGI looks especially clumsy, but are still a lot of fun.  The later films won't win any Oscars but will certainly entertain you.

The disks are bare bones, no extras, no commentary, not even subtitles, and two films are crammed onto each disk.  The box also lacks the 6th and final (??) film, but is a fraction of the price of the 6 film box that just came out.
A nice collection in one case.  If your a fan you'll love set.
Fun movies, all in one package.

If you like the movies, you will like this. Shipped fast. I probably should have waited for the Movie from
